pkgmetadata.longdescription: Various Options and Add-ins for Lattice // This package, Lattice Options and Add-ins (or loa), contains various plots and functions that make use of the lattice/trellis plotting framework. The plots (which include loaPlot, GoogleMap and trianglePlot) use panelPal, a function that extends lattice and hexbin package methods to automate plot subscripting and panel- to-panel and panel-to key synchronization/management. See ?loa for further details.
